title: 3DTILES_temporal_batch_table extension
description: Specifies the properties of 3DTILES_temporal extension stored in the batch table

startDates.description: Start dates of existence of the features in the real world. Dates are organized according to the batch id (same as for the batch table)

endDates.description: End dates of existence of the features in the real world. Dates are organized according to the batch id (same as for the batch table)

featureIds.description: Array of ids of the features. Used in versions and transactions to identify the features.
